repository.orgName: Staats- und Universitätsbibliothek Hamburg Carl von Ossietzky

msContents.summary: Manuscript contains the commentary on Yājñavalkyasmṛti written by Vijñāneśvara . On the front there is note emntiong the title and other inforamtion of the manuscritp. The information on the user note is Vijñāneśvarīya, Dharma By Vijñāneśvarabhaṭṭa (first two Adhyāyas) Granth pages 204 9 lines. The mansuript ends with the second chapter of the Yājñavalkyasmṛti .

msItem.title: Mitākṣarā (Yājñavalkyasmṛtivyākhyā of Vijñāneśvara, Ch. 1 and 2 )

filiation.p: New Catalogus Catalogorum vol 20 pp: 214, Vol. 22 pp:13-14

msItem.incipit: 1v 1 dharmādharmau . tadvipākāstrayopi kleśāḥ pañca ́(prāṇināmā)yatante yasminnetairno parāmṛṣṭa īśo yastaṃ vande viṣṇumoṅkāravācyam .. yājñavalkyamunipuṅgave 1v 2 śitaṃ viśvarūpavikaṭoktivistṛtam dharmaśāstramṛjubhirmitākṣarairbālavidhaye vivicyate .. yājñavalyaśiṣyaḥ kaścitpraśnottararūpaṃ yājñavalkyapraṇi 1v 3 tandharmmaśāstraṃ saṃkṣipya kathayāmāsa yathā manuproktaṃ bhṛguḥ tasya cāyamādyaślokaḥ … yogīśvaraṃ yājñavalkyaṃ saṃpūjya munayo bruvan varṇāśrame
msItem.explicit: 208r 7 thā mātā garbhapoṣaṇāya datānnapānādināsvayamupabhuktena tṛptā satī svajaṭharagatamapatyaṃ tarpayati annapānādīdāyīnaśca pratyupakāraphalena saṃyojayantitadvadvasavo ru 208r 8 drā āditisutā ādityā ete pitaraḥ pitfpitāmahatprapītā maśabdavācyāḥ na kevaladevadattādaya eva srāddhadevatāḥ śrāddhakarmasaṃpradānabhutāḥ kimataḥ parama manuṣyāṇāṃ pitṛdevatādi

support.p: Dark brown colored wooden guard folio with some scratches.

extent.measure: 4 blank folio 2 guard folio and 208 written folio

supportDesc.foliation: Tamil letter numerals in the left margin of the verso.
supportDesc.condition: Very good state with some folio margins are broken and therefore loss of folioation. Sometimes wormholes are seen,.

handNote.desc: Clean and clear hand writing. 2 string holes.

additions.desc: On 1v hariḥ oṃ is written in the left margin.
User note Vijñāneśvarīya, Dharma By Vijñāneśvarabhaṭṭa (first two Adhyāyas) Granth pages 204 9 lines.

listBibl.bibl: The Mitākṣarā with Visvarūpa and Commentaries of Subodhinī Bālaṃbhaṭṭi Edi by S S Setlur , University of Madras 1912.

encodingDesc.p: Spaces are added to separate words.
